types.html:
mot caché m (plural mots cachés)

  1. (games) word search, a type of puzzle using a rectangular grid of letters, with words made from most of the letters to be eliminated from a provided list to reveal unused letters that form the hidden word

See also

[edit]
  • mots croisés
  • kakuro
  • sudoku
trans: word search, a type of puzzle using a rectangular grid of letters, with words made from most of the letters to be eliminated from a provided list to reveal unused letters that form the hidden word
